entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
